about_the_game:
Pathfinder® for Savage Worlds: Rise of the Runelords! Book 6 – Spires of Xin-Shalast

It has remained hidden for millennia in its narrow valley in the shadow of Mhar Massif--a mountain of mythological proportions and sinister history. Atop this peak, bearing the unsettling carven visage for which it was named, stand the fabled Spires of Xin-Shalast, rising above the city like the pinnacles of a crown. Thus did Karzoug show his mastery over both the earth and the realms beyond.
